about_the_game:
Toy Battlegrounds is a shoot 'em up survival game set in a kid’s bedroom. Battle endless waves of toys using a variety of weapons in atmospheric nighttime surroundings. Survive against different enemy types, collect power-ups, and prove your skills in this action-packed toy war!

About Toy Battlegrounds

Toy Battlegrounds is a shoot 'em up survival game set in the vibrant and chaotic world of a kid’s bedroom. Transformed to toy size, you must survive relentless waves of animated toys that come to life in the dead of night. Use a variety of weapons, each with unique firepower, and unlock power-ups to enhance your arsenal.

Key Features

Face off against different enemy types, from swarming toy soldiers to hulking bosses, all while navigating around the room’s obstacles. With an atmospheric nighttime setting, intense gameplay, and non-stop action, Toy Battlegrounds challenges you to hold your ground and become the ultimate toy hero!

name: Toy Battlegrounds: Shoot 'Em Up Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Gen8
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Gen10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews:
“A fast-paced bullet hell where toy battles turn into intense survival mayhem!”
Gaming Nexus

“A vibrant bullet hell experience where kids' toys come to life in an exhilarating survival showdown!”
Hardcore Gamer

“A child's playroom turned into a thrilling battleground filled with relentless toy enemies!”
Pixel Bandits
